summary: Completed frontend testing of Warrior's Way RPG fitness tracker. Successfully verified login flow, dashboard functionality, navigation, and core UI components. Purple theme and branding implemented correctly. Found tempo tracker and exercise forms working, but browser crash prevented complete interaction testing.

ui_bugs.issue: Browser crashed during detailed form interaction testing

integration_issues.issue: Could not complete full testing of decimal inputs due to browser crash
Could not complete full testing of reps range input and form submission

passed_tests: User login flow with test@hero.com / hero123
Dashboard loading with user stats display
Warrior's Way branding visible in navigation
User stats display (STR: 12, END: 13, AGI: 11, Level 2)
XP and level progression display (85/200 XP)
Training plans file upload zone with PDF/Images/Text support
Weightlifting page tempo tracker (Rep Counter) component presence
Exercise form structure with dropdown, sets, reps, weight fields
Import Plan button in weightlifting session
RPG elements display (quests, achievements, recent activity)
Responsive navigation bar with all menu items
Statistics section showing workout counts and total XP
action_item_for_main_agent: Complete interaction testing for tempo tracker decimal inputs (1.5, 2.123, 0.75) and reps range input ('8-12', '10-15'). Verify exercise dropdown selection and form submission work properly. Previous issues with exercise selection and weight input retention may still need verification.
